aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWFStandAloneRuleEngine) (Def Version:3) (Implem Version:1)
Age : Int4 Amount : Num8
procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Boolean) ; if (self.Age >= 18) and (self.Age <= 40) ; if self.Amount = 150000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Oral Test:Oral Fluid Test') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 150000) and (self.Amount <= 250000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Non-Medical Health Statement') self.AppendComment('Oral Test:Oral Fluid Test') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 250000) and (self.Amount <= 1000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Non-Medical Health Statement') self.AppendComment('Vitals') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 1000000) and (self.Amount <= 3000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 3000000) and (self.Amount <= 5000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif self.Amount > 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('Stress ECG:Stress Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; endIf elseif (self.Age > 40) and (self.Age <= 50) ; if self.Amount <= 150000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Non-Medical Health Statement') self.AppendComment('Oral Test:Oral Fluid Test') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 150000) and (self.Amount <= 500000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Non-Medical Health Statement') self.AppendComment('Vitals') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 500000) and (self.Amount <= 1000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 1000000) and (self.Amount <= 5000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif self.Amount > 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('Stress ECG:Stress Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; endIf ; elseif (self.Age > 50) and (self.Age <= 55) ; if self.Amount <= 150000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Non-Medical Health Statement') self.AppendComment('Oral Test:Oral Fluid Test') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 150000) and (self.Amount <= 500000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 500000) and (self.Amount <= 3000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 3000000) and (self.Amount <= 5000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif self.Amount > 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('Stress ECG:Stress Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; endIf ; elseif (self.Age > 55) and (self.Age <= 65) ; if self.Amount <= 250000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 250000) and (self.Amount <= 3000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 3000000) and (self.Amount <= 5000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif self.Amount > 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('Stress ECG:Stress Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; endIf ; elseif (self.Age > 65) and (self.Age <= 70) ; if self.Amount <= 150000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 150000) and (self.Amount <= 1000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Paramedical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif (self.Amount > 1000000) and (self.Amount <= 5000000) self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif self.Amount > 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('Stress ECG:Stress Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; endIf elseif self.Age > 70 ; if self.Amount <= 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('ECG:Electrocardiogram') Result = True ; elseif self.Amount > 5000000 self.AppendComment('Documents Requested') self.AppendComment('Medical') self.AppendComment('BCP:Blood Chemistry Profile') self.AppendComment('Urine') self.AppendComment('Stress ECG:Stress Electrocardiogram') Result = True endIf endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Medical Evidence Rule
